name: Hip Circles
setup: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Hands on hips or out to sides for balance
steps: Lift right knee to hip height
Circle knee outward, making large circular motion
Move slowly and controlled through full range
Complete prescribed reps in one direction
cues: Make circles as large as comfortable
mistakes: Moving too fast or using momentum
safety: Hold wall or chair if balance is challenging. Stop if you feel pinching in hip joint. Start with small circles if needed.

regressions: Hold wall or chair for balance

prescriptionHints.notes: Excellent hip warmup before squats, lunges, or lower body work. Focus on control over speed.

joints.notes: Start with smaller circles if hips are tight. Move within comfortable range.
